SKU: 14490-085088 UPC: 886003312179 Retail Price: $128.00 This listing is for a NEW with TAGS, Vera Bradley extra large travel tote bag. You will receive the "Trimmed Vera Traveler" bag by Vera Bradley presented in the solid color Espresso Vera Vera fabric. The "Vera Vera" product line features solid color micro-fiber quilted fabric. The Trimmed Vera Traveler is a very generous sized tote style travel bag with one roomy compartment, and lots of pockets for great organization. This stylish and functional bag is just right for summer vacations and weekend get-a-ways too! A great travel bag, it is also a wonderful tote for day outings. And the hands free shoulder strap and top recessed zipper closure makes it the perfect tote to use when browsing festivals or flea markets, as it is definitely big enough to carry all your unique finds and bargains! Vera Bradley sells the Trimmed Vera Traveler in the solid color Vera Vera product line for $128.00. Vera Vera Solid Colors "Solid color Standouts. Vera Vera is here! Rich in sophistication and class. Whether you are looking for something with a more professional vibe, or simply gravitate toward solid-color showstoppers, you will fancy the solid print, micro-fiber Vera Vera product line." Trimmed Vera Traveler "Vera Bradley has expanded their iconic Namesake style, the "Vera", for a travel ready take on a timeless classic. The Trimmed Vera Traveler, is a extra-large travel tote that features chic faux-leather trim, a recessed zip-top closure and a roomy interior with the six large slip pockets you know and love. A front slip pocket, ideal for keys or a smart phone, is bordered on either side with faux-leather trim, for the perfect finishing touch. Details: Extra-large travel tote version of the iconic namesake styleRecessed Zip Top ClosureFaux-leather Trim and Base12" strap dropInside Vera Bradley Logo LiningSix roomy inside slip pockets ring interiorOutside Front Slip PocketSturdy BaseUltimate Carry-all Care Tips: Spot Clean Description: This Vera Bradley "Trimmed Vera Traveler" is presented in the solid color Espresso quilted fabric, from the "Vera Vera" solid micro-fiber fabric line. Espresso is a wonderful shade of deep, dark brown. The Vera Bradley Trimmed Vera Traveler is a very generous sized travel bag measuring approximately 25 ½" across the front, 14 ½" tall, and 7 ½" deep. The Trimmed Vera Traveler features a recessed top zip closure. The brown nylon zipper is 24" long and has a brown faux-leather tab zipper pull. One of the best features of the Trimmed Vera Traveler is all the roomy interior pockets. Unzip the recessed top zip closure to reveal one roomy main compartment lined with six (6) interior slip pockets all round. Both the front and back walls have (3) slip pockets, the slip pocket in the middle is 9" wide flanked by 8"wide pockets. All pockets are a generous 9" deep and are somewhat gusseted, allowing room for expansion. The exterior of the Trimmed Vera Traveler features one (1) large slip pocket on the front. This pocket is 8 ½" and 9" deep. Great for all kinds of essentials and go to items. The pocket is trimmed on either side with faux-leather trim that is actually part of the carry strap. Another wonderful feature on the Trimmed Vera Traveler are the double carry straps. Made from faux-leather, brown in color, each strap measures 28" with a 12" strap drop. Perfect for that comfy shoulderbag fit. Or carry in the crook of you arm or by hand swinging boldly at your side. For adder durability, the bottom exterior base is made of brown faux-leather. The Vera Bradley Vera Tote Purse features a removable cardboard base that fits into a sleeve made from brown Vera Bradley signature material. Base and sleeve can be removed for those times when you want a more flexible bag. Condition: I have several of the Vera Bradley Trimmed Vera Traveler bag in the Espresso color choice, All are New and comes with Original Price Tag. I keep all the Vera Bradley Purses and Travel Bags (both new and used) stored separately in scented plastic bags. All purses are shipped in the scented bag in which is was stored, and are mailed in either boxes or plastic mailer bags, depending on weight and chosen delivery method. Either way, packaging is secure.
